title: Doks Documentation Page Frontmatter
description: Frontmatter schema for documentation pages in Doks

title.title: Page Title
title.description: The title of this documentation page

description.title: Description
description.description: Brief description of the page content for SEO

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Short summary for navigation and list displays

lead.title: Lead Text
lead.description: Introductory paragraph displayed below the title

date.title: Created Date
date.description: When this documentation page was created

lastmod.title: Last Modified
lastmod.description: When this page was last updated

draft.title: Draft Status
draft.description: If true, page won't be published

weight.title: Navigation Weight
weight.description: Order in navigation menu (lower = higher priority)

toc.title: Table of Contents
toc.description: Show table of contents for this page

aliases.title: URL Aliases
aliases.description: Alternative URLs that redirect to this page

title.title: Custom SEO Title
title.description: Override the page title for SEO

canonical.title: Canonical URL
canonical.description: Canonical URL if content exists elsewhere
